name: Escape Escape
description:
A short story with a playtime of about 10 minutes.

◆Story

You wake up in a mysterious room.
Without hesitation, you blow away the items placed on the desk.
On the monitor in front of you... the person who set this up is surprised and flustered.

"Hey! What are you doing? Let me play my game!"

ｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰｰ

"Escape Escape" is an ADV (Adventure) game where you explore maps, interact with characters, and progress through the game.

◆Game Features

・Engage in conversations with characters and various forms of communication.

・Examine objects to advance the story.

・There are no quest markers or time limits, allowing you to proceed at your own pace.

"If you eat 11 or more items of food, you can see an additional ending."
